name: Ruwan Linton
body:
### About Ruwan
I am the Director of Engineering at [AdroitLogic](http://adroitlogic.org) geared towards delivering the best ESB (Enterprise Service Bus) and the associate solutions around the ESB. I am also an [Apache Member](http://www.apache.org/foundation/members.html) and a PMC member for several Apache projects. Previously I have been working in WSO2 as the Architect and Product Manager for the WSO2 ESB. I have a deep understanding on the concepts of API Management, SOA, Middleware, Web Services & Enterprise Integration.

My goal is to be a useful software designer for the community and be satisfied with the work I do.

I hold a first class B.Sc. Engineering degree from Univsity of Moratuwa specialized in [Computer Science & Engineering](http://www.cse.mrt.ac.lk/). My areas of interest are Distributed Computing, Programming Languages, Theory of Computing and Compilers. I watch movie in most of my leisure times and loves to drive fast.

### Specialties
Specialized in API Management, Enterprise Integration Patterns, SOA, ESB, Web services, Deployment Patterns, Java (J2SE/J2EE) programming, JavaScript, Ruby programming, XML, HTML5, AJAX, HTTP, XSLT, OSGi, Spring, Groovy and Grails.

### Blog
You can read my blog at http://blog.ruwan.org 

### Contact Me
You may contact me via email ruwan@adroitlogic.com
